reviews.review: Just finnished the game. Best story I have ever played. Plot twists were presented at the pirfect times, when you least expect it. Combat is great when compaired to modern games, the powers are VERY cool and impact the battle significantly. I would rate this game a 9.7/10 due to decently predictable AI.

I had never played any of the previous bioshock games, but after hearing from others about it's legendary status, I finally conceded and bought it during the Summer Sale. I did not regret this purchase one bit. I expected the game would take me a few days to complete as I tend to have a pretty short attention span with most games. I played this game 9 hours straight, and beat it in one day. The gameplay is engaging, and the atmosphere of this game is nothing short of breathtaking. 

I would recommend this game to ANYONE, who asked.
Came to Columbia for the girl, came back with tears instead. Now I have to brawl a bear if I want to ever feel manly again.

I've known about this game for years, but only just got around to experiencing this rare breed of shooter. It certainly did not disappoint.

Let us break down Bioshock Infinite in terms of visuals, gameplay and story. 

First off, this game is jaw dropping to look at, even by today’s standards. The lighting and sense of scale are especially spectacular. It brings the city of Columbia to life and encourages you to explore it. You will often spend more time side tracked, just admiring the buildings and interiors. It is a linear game, but it often does an excellent job at making it feel more like an open world, where exploration rewards you with more items, collectibles and additions to the narrative. You uncover the cities secrets if you will.

Gameplay is solid, if not very demanding in later stages. My first playthrough was on the medium difficulty, and it got very challenging in the second half and beyond. I died many, many, many times.... I'm currently on my second playthrough, having unlocked the '1999 mode' (wish me luck.... I'm gonna' need it).

The game has a small number of weapons, but they all feel distinct and purposeful in different scenarios, though I spent most of the time running around with the good old pistol, since it seems to be the most versatile gun in the game. It is annoying how you can only carry two firearms at a time though, so if you're going to upgrade a weapon, make sure it's one that you use all the time. However, the Sky Hook is truly amazing. It is hands down the most satisfying melee weapon I have ever used in a game. It's brutal, gory and bloody awesome!

The Vigors make you feel like a force to be reckoned with, my favourite being Charge, with Possession being another good one. They make this game stand out from other shooters by giving you supernatural powers and a profound sense of dominance over your enemies. Why throw grenades when you can release deadly crows from your arms!?

The story is perhaps the main reason to play Bioshock Infinite, something that you simply must experience yourself, so I won't spoil anything, but I can report that Elizabeth is a truly enchanting ally. Unlike most AI characters, she is genuinely reliable and does useful things to help you in combat!

Basically, this game is amazing. Aside from a few oddities here and there, it is a solid story driven action game and I certainly will be playing the DLC, as well as the first two BioShock’s.

(On a side note, there is an annoying bug which causes the audio to distort overtime. There is an easy fix though, so just look it up on Google.)

Замечательная часть BoiShock Infinite. Превосходный сюжет, неожиданная концовка, но в то же время и грустная. Так же под конец есть отсылка на самое начало первую часть BioShock. Совсем не жалею потраченных денег хоть и купил со скидкой. 
Жалко только, что дополнение дорогое и не смогу в них поиграть. 
Минусов только два:
1 – когда прослушиваешь найденные записи то нет субтитров с переводом на русский.
2 – если встать рядом с жителями, когда идёт основной диалог то всё путается и ничего не понятно.
А в конце хочу сказать огромное спасибо разработчикам этой игры.

I was hesitant to buy it at first. I wasn't exactly a fan of Bioshock 2, so I was not expecting much from the game. Let me just tell you right here that it was worth every fucking buck. I had no idea it was originally so expensive, so to get it for 7 bucks it  was a steal. 

The game is beautiful, the story is beautiful- everything was well designed. No crashes on my shitty laptop, no stuttering. Everything was perfect.

Elizabeth's idle animations are amazing and well crafted. Dialogue is also not limited, and the game is just full of surprises. The most fun part for me is none other than the skylines- hearing the wind, the metal and seeing the animations all coming together is a hell of an experience. 10/10 with rice.

首先说一句：很抱歉我要给这个被捧上神坛的游戏泼一泼冷水、脏水

非打折不推荐入手

之前盗版通了一次本体加DLC，现在入正之后也是这样

剧情8分：关于剧情方面，在此不再赘述，毕竟是2013年出的游戏，各大主播也基本翻来覆去做了个烂。从整体来看我认为生化奇兵无限的本体剧情有些虎头蛇尾的感觉，不过之后的DLC海葬两部曲倒是给了不错的补充，也可以说是凤头豹尾了吧。

还有就是其中的一些伏笔/包袱，感觉未能很好的收集反馈，如布克在看到哥伦比亚入侵现代纽约之后，你可能认为也许主人公将要乱入其中，完成一些决定整个游戏走向的重大决定（事实上对于喜爱怀旧的玩家也是具有相当的吸引力），可惜从后面来看只是Irrational Games给你搭了个影棚过了过眼瘾，这无疑让人有相当的落差感。

开场乘坐火箭（？）直升三万英尺，然后映入眼帘的是让人美到窒息的天空之城哥伦比亚，绝不亚于生化奇兵1进入潜水球发现销魂城的震撼，但当你想体会体会其中的人文风情，你就被城管发现，然后不得不开干，而且是一口气从头干到尾。

这让我感觉非常不爽，想体会这种反乌托邦题材的游戏显然不是你杀杀杀就能感受到的，而游戏通过录音来提供剧情的补全这种做法我只感觉让隔阂感更深。整个游戏之后就是僵硬的寻找补给>杀敌>听磁带，而后期到处都是似曾相识的高光建筑其实看着并不让人讨喜。整个人感觉就像是住在装修齐全的样板房里一样，美是很美，但没有水电。

游戏手感：2 如果布克能像前几作的主角和DLC海葬2中的伊丽莎白那样，持有所有武器，我可能还能给个5~6分，但很可惜原本糟糕的手感加上只能拿两种的枪械，2分我想是个合适的评价。
Irrational Games显然想让人更多的通过异能与敌人进行作战，但我觉得他们的异能设计的相当糟糕，远不如前作中的质体能力，华美的游戏场景带来的一个副作用就是你很难找到你的敌人在哪里，因为你的眼睛可能已经被各种光影效果和渲染闪爆。

画面做的偏向卡通但并不意味着游玩手感也要偏向“卡通”，里面像什么霰弹枪/突击枪除了浪费子弹之外屁用没有，里面有七成的枪械打哪都准就是打目标不准，然后直接导致售货机中大部分关于枪械的升级无用。

在敌人的硬直系统方面老肯倒是很好的“致敬”了前作，如果没有玩过前作听不懂我冷笑话的，我就这样告诉你们：敌人几乎没有硬直，无论你打中了头/腿/肩或是其他什么地方，敌人都只会微微一晃，地上流几滴番茄汁，继续跟你全武斗。抱歉我玩的是2013年的FPS不是03年的FPS，而生化奇兵无限的射击手感我觉得极好的展示了什么叫“一丑遮百俊”，越活越回去了老肯，二十年前在DOS上运行的毁灭战士手感比你高不知道到哪里去了！（一切形式吹DOOM）

恩，主要可能还是我更偏好有着大量支线的FALLOUT，生化奇兵1和2虽然也是线性流程，但给人的感觉非常之好，人物之间的斗争，剧情的一波三折，最后的惊天秘密等。而无限在开场之后的惊艳只感觉剩下了无穷的“突突突”。

地图设计：4.5分。我想这可能是对生化奇兵无限不感冒的原因，生化奇兵无限看似给你了极大地探索空间，可实际上只是大堆的空气墙和跳不下去的量子云传送门，我能够对一个游戏起到画龙点睛作用的就是对于地图秘密地点的收集，或者说解密，生化奇兵的前作在这一点上做的也很好，比如火焰质体可以融冰发现一些秘密补给，而冰系质体又可以冻住水面，到达一些平时去不了的地方。

无限虽然有很多的异能，但完全没有吸取前作的优秀经验，除了吃老本的海葬DLC想起来这回事之外，本体中异能除了战斗就只能战斗，哦还有抢超市，唉老肯你的想象力怎么这么匮乏了？而且说实在的大部分异能只会给自己带来更多的麻烦，我宁愿一直用枪，而不愿意一个火球在自己脸上开花。

我想归根到底恐怕还是Irrational Games内部的问题，扯皮来扯皮去，眼高手低，粉丝过高的期望加上老肯并不是一个能够驾驭得住别人的人，生化奇兵无限游戏所呈现出来的正好是一种矛盾，这倒是与Irrational Games之后的解散遥相呼应了。

现在游戏版权又交回了2K手里，希望有个天才来继续BIOSHOCK的故事吧，一个人，一座灯塔，一座城市的故事。（不然还是雪藏起来以后卖版权也还好，别糟蹋了）

Com certeza esse, junto com os outros jogos da franquia, foram os melhores da minha vida.

O jogo se chama Bioshock Infinite porque [spoiler] existem INFINITAS possibilidades, o final é totalmente subjetivo, existem muitas teorias mas ninguem até hoje chegou a resposta, e nem precisa chegar, a interpretação mais correta seria aceitar que existem infinitas interpretações e que todas as outras estão corretas, mesmo somente uma podendo estar.[/spoiler] o jogo é uma grande ideia filosofica ou os devaneios de um gênio.

Bioshock Infinite is EASILY my favorite game. Even as a departure from Rapture, and all we knew from Jack, and Johnny Topside in the first games. I cannot gush about this enough. From excellent environments, colorful, but somber, to the vigors, compacted from the first two games, but upgradable, the game feels more impactful. 

Comparing my playthroughs between bioshock, and infinite, (subtracting things like graphic capabilities of 2007 and 2013, of course), I found myself much more invested in the world, characters, plot, etc. I love elizabeth, and I feel the want to protect her, and heartbroken in her story as a deuteragonist, and later protanganist. We actually get to see her, up close. Same with comstock, and the Lutece twins, where as in the first game, besides, spoilers, killing andrew ryan and fontaine, all other important characters are basically kept away from us. Behind glass, where we can't see their emotions, reactions, and thoughts.

The combat feels more autonomous. In playing bioshock after this, I feel like I'm only smashing buttons. But in infinite, I feel my own impact on the enemies, and the stakes seem higher when an enemy hits me. 

Over all, the game feels more appealing, and emotional. Five stars. If I complain about anything at all, it would probably be how lifeless NPCs can look out of cutscenes. For example, Daisy fitzroy when we meet her, versus when she kills Fink. Her eyes are different, and void. But, of course, this goes hand in hand with the uncanny valley, and probably will be remedied in later instalments of Bioshock, if we see them.
Amazing 10/10. The ending left me speechless and so much to think about.

This is a great game.  Great story, great combat and a mind-blowing ending.  Well worth the money.  I never play games like this through more than once, but I find myself wanting to play through it a second time because it's so enjoyable.
juegazoooooooooooooooooooooooooo

I personally think this game has a great story on display here but the core gameplay loop leaves much to be desired, at least for me it does. The two weapon system feels overly restrictive and doesn't leave much room or any room at all for player experimentation when it comes to what weapons you use and how you use them and combining them with the vigors. The combat isn't terrible but it's not that great either. The story is the meat of the game here and if you don't mind very restricted combat then I would say go for it but in terms of gameplay mechanics the game leaves a lot to be desired. Fortunately the DLC Burial at Sea fixes some of the issues with the combat except for the two weapon system. The DLC feels like playing the original Bioshock again with limited resources and difficult enemies. If anything in the game is worthy of a recommendation I believe that the DLC is more than deserving of a recommendation.

Let me start off by saying that this is the best game I've ever played. And trust me, I've played a lot of games (Not necessarily on steam). The characters are great, with amazing voice acting and deep personalities. The gameplay itself is better than the first bioshocks. THe only bad thing about this game is that it was so good I wish it lasted longer.
Overall 11/10
Bioshock Infinite is still good as the original Bioshock.

Было видно, что игра, которая стоила 100 миллионов долларов, стоит своих 100 миллионов. Концовка как в фильме "Бойцовский клуб", самый живой мир в играх, своя религия и всё это Bioshock Infinite.
Плюсы можно говорить вам через этот обзор на протяжении несколько десяток минут, но зачем? Эти плюсы вы должны увидеть своими глазами, почувствовать, "пощупать"...
А вот минусы... Минусов мало, а то есть один - это трата множество времени на сцены с перестрелками.
Игра явно заслужила свои 10/10.

А напоследок - советы:

1) Даже если у вас минимум знания слов на Английском - не ставьте русскую озвучку и замена текстур с надписями.
2) Играйте в эту игру одному и вникайте в каждую деталь этого прекрасного мира.
3) Не забывайте нажимать на клавишу "N".

И не забывайте: "Твоё дело — кровь, Девитт, а моё — пророчества."

系列首部有官汉的作品
一二代的汉化太复杂，相比一下这部质量高的感人，游戏也有几个bug，在dlc里有个气门在开过一次后再开一次就一直处于开的状态，只能重新载入剧情，在玩海葬这段的时候，这个bug害我反反复复打了几次。
有没有理论化、系统化研究《生化奇兵：无限》这部作品的朋友，我们来组一个“无限学者研究团”，现在急需掌握大量量子力学，宇宙学，马克思主义理论哲学知识和拥有深不可测脑洞的人才，希望广大“生化奇兵：无限学家”，简称无学家，积极联系我，我们共同探讨。
one of the best games ever and possibly one of the best endings ever

bioshock infinite para mi es el MEJOR shooter de un jugador del mundo.Se nota que los desarrolladores le dieron mucho tiempo y cariño porque es una joya.Buena banda sonora,IA acceptable,graficos alucinantes y sobretodo como puedes interactuar con el mapa es un pasada.
Lo mejor del juego sin duda es Elisabeth.Te ajuda con la vida,municion,sales,... .Tambien interactua con todo es mapa y tambien me encanta como son las expresiones faciales(son una pasada lo bien logradas que estan).
No se que haces viendo este comentario simplemente compralo si entiendes de obras maestras.
No habiendo jugado al primero ni el segundo, este me ha encantando. Lo recomiendo juegazo que tendria que haberme pasado hace tiempo...
스토리, 배경 , 액션. 그리고 몰입감이 말이 필요없는 GOD겜
The best FPS game ever, plot is nice with a little bit twist at the end that makes you think like "is this even real?". HUD is nice, control is good. Make sure to set the difficulty to the highest!

简单模式通关只为体验剧情，通关以后有种怅然若失的感觉，当真相大白的时候也是游戏结束的时候，剧情烧脑又丰富实在让人佩服编剧。去除战斗真的是不可多得的好作品，细节多到无敌，第九艺术不是每个游戏都能叫的。幻想有一天能改变成美剧~

伊丽莎白小姐姐[spoiler]大误	[/spoiler]敲可爱好么~！

Fogj egy kurva jó szoryt.Adj hozzá egy fps feelinget.Füszerezd meg steampunkal és confusing endiggel.. És bumm kész ez a játék
Bármilyen tipusú játékokat szeretsz ezt a játékot tetszeni fog.
A season pass nem valami nagy szám de megéri, vedd meg a collectiont.
És a játék egy picit nehéz de nem baj

Életem egyik legjobb játéka komolyan mondom.
劇情值得思考 戰鬥方面也很流暢 簡單來講就是神作.
uno de los jefes finales mas dificiles, unos 2o intentos x ahi hsata que me lo cepillé, el juego me ha gustado ,pero me gustó mas el bioshock 1 y 2,

游戏跟它的名字一样，所打出的结局只是一个平行世界里的故事，然而在其余无限个世界里，发生的只是无限次循环的往事。主角本来只是来还清他所欠下的赌博债，却发现还要还清在另一个平行世界里自己所犯的过错，但还不完的确是他的父女债。一次一次只有无限的轮回，最终他选择在开始的地方选择了结束。美丽的天空城不是梦开始的地方，而梦里的巴黎确是永远达不到的地方。
这个游戏被称为第九艺术，玩一次就如同谈了一次恋爱一般。只不过恋爱分分合合，有圆满有分离，而游戏里只有道不完的悲痛和后悔之情。

10/10

Miss you Booker.

내가 감히 평가할 수 있는 게임이 아니었다. 
하지만 이 말은 할 수 있다. 한글번역이 매우 충격과 공포이므로 한글패치를 해야 할 것이다.

这游戏应该叫 玩谁死谁：无限 有没有人性啊，主角又死了XD 一代老死，二代累死，三代被自己女儿淹死，就连DLC也没放过主角，哪怕不是一个人。海葬一被钻头钻死，海葬二被扳手敲死。不过剧情不错，人设也不错伊丽莎白超萌的，而且这个队友我觉得可以说是我玩过的所有游戏里最能帮上忙的队友了。能帮你开锁，被打残了会给你找医疗包，没子弹了她也会尽可能寻找一些子弹给你，平时还会帮你四处搜刮资源，有时还能帮你探路，周围有敌人他还会警告你，只帮你忙，绝不拖你后腿。剧情有点烧脑，大概意思就是我们控制的主角在一次受洗中出现了接受和不接受两个位面，接受的成为了神父（以下称之为神父）创造了天空之城，而我们控制的是不接受位面的主角，神父派人来主角存在的位面提议用他的女儿也就是伊丽莎白拿来抵债我们的主角一开始同意了，但后来突然后悔，试图夺回女儿，慌乱之中神父叫人关闭了传送门伊丽莎白也就被关闭的传送门切断了一节手指，这也是为什么她有控制位面的能力，主角也就疯了，时常把找女儿和某件事弄混，最后就成了要去一个地方把一个叫伊丽莎白的纽约去抵债。结尾主角说要复仇，最后被淹死是因为如果在受洗后主角还活着那么这场悲剧就会永远一遍遍持续下去，所以他必须回到受洗前然后杀死自己。
剧情很有内涵，引人深思。天空之城的设定加上蒸汽朋克的风格，不愧为第九艺术。值得购买的佳作。
Ending = Mind blown.

Wonderful Story, Wonderful Graphics, Wonderful Game..
优秀的画面（不能说优秀，应该说我看到这种画面的游戏的时候，就感觉有什么东西biu的一下跑进我的心里,特别是最后的那首歌，玫瑰人生）游戏性我就不说了fps，有各种技能搭配可供选择，优秀的背景音乐，画面丰满的人物（不光是主角，其它配角也是，包括大老爹，尤其是伊丽莎白）
不論是畫面或是劇情都相當優秀的作品，操作流暢，玩到結局有種恍然大悟的感覺!
10/10 story and fun gameplay worth buying on the sale
good game, you should buy it
